goalSetting.title: Cwangcisa Igunya Lakho Lokuqala
goalSetting.mainQuestion: Yonke indlela ifuna indawo yokufika. Yintoni igunya lakho lokuqala elikhulu lezimali?

goals.holiday: Gcina ukuze uhambe ngeHolidi yakho Yokuphupha

goalSet.title: Igunya Licwangcisiwe! üéâ
goalSet.message: Kulungile! Ucwangcisile igunya lakho le-{{amount}} le-{{goalTitle}}. Masiqale ukufunda nge-interest ephindaphindiweyo!

simulate.title: Zama
simulate.subtitle: Jonga ukuba imali yakho ingakhula/kuncipha njani ngokuhamba kwexesha
simulate.aggressiveDesc: Ingozi enkulu, amathuba okufumana imali eninzi
simulate.paymentTooSmall: ‚ö†Ô∏è Intlawulo incinci kakhulu ukuhlawula imali okanye ixesha liphelile sele linemali esele:
simulate.add200Desc: Hlawula R200 ngaphezulu ngenyanga ukunciphisa i-interest neenyanga.
simulate.add500Desc: Hlawula R500 ngaphezulu ngenyanga ukuhlawula ngokukhawuleza.
simulate.roundUp100Desc: Yandisa intlawulo yakho ukuya kwi-R100 elandelayo.
simulate.thirteenthDesc: Yenza intlawulo efana nenye ngenyanga ngonyaka.
simulate.compoundGrowthInsight: Imali yakho etshaliweyo ingakhula ngaphezu kwemali oyifakileyo nge-interest ephindaphindiweyo!
simulate.timeInsight: Nge-{{years}} iminyaka, unika i-interest ephindaphindiweyo ixesha elaneleyo lokusebenza.
simulate.contributionInsight: Umsebenzi omhle! Ukungenisa R{{amount}} ngenyanga kukubeka endleleni eya kwiinjongo zakho.
simulate.debtInsight: Ukwandisa intlawulo yakho ngemali encinci kunokunciphisa iinyanga zokuhlawula kwaye unciphise i-interest.
simulate.savingsTableHint: Ukugcina imali: i-interest yonyaka ithi ikhule njengoko imali ikhula (ukuphindaphindwa kwe-interest).
simulate.debtTableHint: Imali ekufuneka uyihlawule: i-interest yonyaka ithi inciphise njengoko imali ekhokelwayo inciphisa.
simulate.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Oku kukulinganisela okulula ngenjongo yokufundisa. Iziphumo zokwenene zingahluka kakhulu ngenxa yokutshintsha kwemakethe, iindleko, nezinye izinto. Ukusebenza kwangaphambili akuthembisi ukusebenza kwesikhatshana.
simulate.chartError: Itshathi ayikwazanga ukubonisa. Oku kuthi kwenzeke xa i-react-native-svg ingasebenzi. Ungasebenzisa isilinganiselo ngaphandle kwetshathi.
simulate.chartFixTips: Iingcebiso zokulungisa: iOS ‚Üí `cd ios && pod install`, emva koko cima & yakha kwakhona. Android ‚Üí `cd android && ./gradlew clean`, emva koko yakha kwakhona.
simulate.scenarioProjection: Le {{scenarioName}} imeko ilinganisa ukubuyiselwa kwe-{{returnRate}}% ngonyaka ophindaphindiweyo ngenyanga. Ngezinto ozifakileyo nge-{{years}} {{yearUnit}}, imali yakho elinganiselweyo iya kuba ngu-{{total}} apho {{growth}} kukukhula kwe-interest ephindaphindiweyo.
simulate.scenarioImplication: Ithetha ukuthi: Indlela ye-{{scenarioName}} ijolise ku-{{returnRate}}% ngonyaka kwixesha elide, ivuma ukutshintsha kwe-{{volatility}}.
simulate.scenarioDisclaimer: Iziphumo zokwenene ziyahluka; oku akusithembiso. Yisebenzise ukuva ukuba intlawulo nexesha zitshintsha iziphumo.
